author: Sarah Thomas
title: Second Californian man dies from COVID-19 after returning home from Ruby Princess
description: A family in the US sues Princess Cruises for more than $US1 million after a 64-year-old man died after developing COVID-19 after a trip on on the Ruby Princess.
content:
Posted 
April 18, 2020 11:57:07
A family in the US is suing Princess Cruises for more than $US1 million ($1.6 million) for failing to alert passengers to the risk of exposure to coronavirus on the Ruby Princess. 
Key points:
